channel.title: Please help with skill! ;(
channel.description:
I got an image to explain this. How do I add a 99 skill to these tabs? What file? Cause I just added hunter and the 99 is not showing. What can I do? I am using project insanity
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/20s6d7b.png[/img]

item.title: Please help with skill! ;(
item.dc:creator: @ClairtyX ClairtyX
item.description:
@ClairtyX wrote:

Andys Awesome:

Its not just an image you can just add,… The whole skill needs to be added. If you plan on just adding a number that does nothing you should just remove it from the skills list…

I actually added full working hunter, it’s just it does not show what level it is. How would I add a functional skill tab? Thanks. If you could lead me to a guide or just explain that would be great!

Read full topic
